reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Supporting power sector reform in South China to increase integration of renewable energy into the region.

description.narrative: This project is designed to support China's adoption of new market arrangements in its power sector to enable the effective integration of renewable energy. Building on a previous project, it will draw upon UK policy and market expertise to inform and accelerate Yunnan's power market reforms and create new bilateral partnerships in key reform pilots, including in Chongqing and Guangdong. It is expected that the market structure decisions taken by China will generate commercial opportunities for international business, including from UK. This project will further set groundwork for the Energy/Low Carbon pillar of a China prosperity programme, which will match China's specific reform needs with energy and low carbon sector strengths, reducing global emissions by accelerating China's energy transition.
